basic.Source: Bacillus amyloliquefaciens FZB42 & Bacillus pumilus (Bacillus mesentericus) (Gram-positive bacteria)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis HB0042, Bacillus subtilis strain 168, Bacillus megaterium 7A1, Bacillus anthracis (MIC=2-4 µg/ml), Bacillus brevis strain ATCC 8246, Bacillus cereus strain ATCC 14579 and strain CU1065, Bacillus licheniformis strain ATCC 9789, Micrococcus luteus, Bacillus sphaericus, Paenibacillus granivorans and Streptococcus pyogenes (MIC=128 µg/ml).
